title: Stockfish for Soccer
description: Check out to see a new machine learning approach to valuing passing sequences in soccer. Learn what makes a quality passing sequence and how players can utilize certain techniques at certain parts of the field.

title: 2 Strikes on a Hitter's Swing
description: This article explore how various characteristics of a hitter's swing change when they are on 2 strikes.
